name: Evasio
description:
Evasio is a mixed puzzle-platformer/escape single player game where the player impersonates a child trapped between two universes. He needs to escape from the Imagos, deadly inhabitants of the Dark World.

The game universe is composed by two specular realities, two cities with inverse gravity: one having dark and moody colors; the other with bright and light ones. One reality is full of dangerous shadows and blocked passages, while the other is more safer and has some puzzles to solve in order to proceed.

The child will have to teleport from a reality to another by portals that invert gravity, until it succeeds to escape the enemies, overcome the obstacles and find the right way home.

Collect the keys, solve the puzzles and escape the Imagos in order to reach the final room, in the Mole Antonelliana, the symbol of Turin. Only then you will be able to discover what is real, and what is not.

This project is born from the minds of students at Polytechnic of Turin, in the course of Virtual Reality:

  • Diego Bruno
  • Gianpiero Carrieri 
  • Cosmin Angheluta
  • Simone Lo Priore
